page.title: 18A Playground Game - Kent
page.content: One of the games we play in the school playground is called Colour Bulldogs. To play this game you have to have two lines a few metres apart with one person who is IT in the middle and all the other people who are playing standing just behind one of the lines. The person who is IT calls out a colour, say Pink, and anyone who is wearing either Pink clothes or shoes can walk straight across to the other side without being had. Anyone who hasn't any Pink on, has to get to the other side quickly without being caught. If they are caught then they are also IT and there are now two people IT. They then choose another colour and start again. - Samantha and Lisa -
